CMP-PLATFORM-DEV-KEY.description: Platform compartment for oke Dev related resources

CMP-PLATFORM-MGT-KEY.name: cmp-lzp-m-platform-oke
CMP-PLATFORM-MGT-KEY.description: Platform compartment for shared oke mgt related resources

grp-lzp-p-platform-oke-admins.name: grp-lzp-p-platform-oke-admins
grp-lzp-p-platform-oke-admins.description: Group responsible for administrating oke dev cluster

grp-lzp-d-platform-oke-admins.name: grp-lzn-d-platform-oke-admins
grp-lzp-d-platform-oke-admins.description: Group responsible for administrating oke dev cluster

grp-lzp-p-platform-oke-viewer-role.description: Group for prod rbal viewer role

grp-lzp-p-platform-oke-admin-role.name: grp-lzp-p-platform-oke-admin-role
grp-lzp-p-platform-oke-admin-role.description: Group for prod rbal admin role

grp-lzp-d-platform-oke-admin-role.description: Group for dev rbal admin role

grp-lzp-m-platform-oke-admins.name: grp-lzp-m-platform-oke-admins
grp-lzp-m-platform-oke-admins.description: Group responsible for administrating oke mgt cluster

DG-LZP-SEC-FUN.name: dg-lzp-sec-fun-dynamic-group
DG-LZP-SEC-FUN.description: dynamic group for security functions execution.

DG-LZP-PLATFORM-OKE-PROD.name: dg-lzp-prod-platform-oke
DG-LZP-PLATFORM-OKE-PROD.description: dynamic group authenticated all instance in Prod OKE cluster with OCI through InstancePrincipal.

PCY-ROOT-OKE-ADMINS.name: pcy-p-platform-oke-hibrid
statements: allow any-user to manage instances in tenancy where all { request.principal.type = 'cluster'}
allow any-user to use private-ips in tenancy where all { request.principal.type = 'cluster'}
allow any-user to use network-security-groups in tenancy where all { request.principal.type = 'cluster'}

PCY-P-PLATFORM-OKE-ADMINS.name: pcy-p-platform-oke-admins
statements: Allow group grp-lzp-p-platform-oke-admins to read all-resources in compartment cmp-landingzone-p:cmp-lzp-prod:cmp-lzp-p-platform:cmp-lzp-p-platform-oke
Allow group grp-lzp-p-platform-oke-admins to manage cluster-family in compartment cmp-landingzone-p:cmp-lzp-prod:cmp-lzp-p-platform:cmp-lzp-p-platform-oke

Allow group grp-lzp-p-platform-oke-admins to manage private-ips in compartment cmp-landingzone-p:cmp-lzp-prod:cmp-lzp-p-network
